muffle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a sound less loud and clear, especially by covering something
muffle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The falling snow muffled the sound of our footsteps.
Her voice was muffled by the pillow in which she had hidden her face.
muffle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to cover yourself or another person with something thick and warm
muffle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Penelope arrived, muffled up in a thick coat.
muffle.translation[0].definitions[1].not: Muffle is usually passive in this meaning
